SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GET_SCANDATE_FROM_SCANSESSION
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets scandate value from Scansession string.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.USR_UFN_GET_SCANDATE_FROM_SCANSESSION ( @scansession varchar(8000) ) RETURNS date with execute as caller as begin declare @returnScanDate date; set @returnScanDate = convert(date,left(SUBSTRING(@scansession,PATINDEX('%21195P%',@scansession)+6,50), dbo.USR_UFN_CHARINDEX2 ('/', SUBSTRING(@scansession,PATINDEX('%21195P%',@scansession)+6,50), 2)+4)) RETURN(@returnScanDate) end
